tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE behavior_data ( 
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  lead_name VARCHAR(255), 
  behavior_type VARCHAR(50), 
  behavior_description TEXT, 
  behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP 
 );

CREATE TABLE Segment (segment_id INT, segment_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Lead (lead_id INT, lead_name VARCHAR(255), behavior_data JSONB, segment_id INT);

CREATE TABLE segments (
  segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  segment_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE leads (
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name TEXT,
  segment_id INT REFERENCES segments(segment_id)
)

CREATE TABLE behaviors (
  behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  behavior_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE lead_behaviors (
  lead_id INT REFERENCES leads(lead_id),
  behavior_id INT REFERENCES behaviors(behavior_id),
  PRIMARY KEY(lead_id, behavior_id)
)
CREATE TABLE Segment (segment_id INT, segment_name VARCHAR(255), segment_criteria TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (segment_id));
CREATE TABLE Lead (lead_id INT, lead_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), segment_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (lead_id), FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES Segment(segment_id));
CREATE TABLE LeadBehavior (behavior_id INT, lead_id INT, behavior_name VARCHAR(255), behavior_data TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (behavior_id), FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES Lead(lead_id));
CREATE TABLE Campaign (campaign_id INT, campaign_name VARCHAR(255), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id));

CREATE TABLE CampaignTarget (target_id INT, campaign_id INT, segment_id INT, target_criteria TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (target_id), FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES Campaign(campaign_id), FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES Segment(segment_id));
